text:
A Tense Conversation

Dounia and Luzhin sit in a dim room.  
Dounia: “I don’t know that.”  
Dounia: “It makes me miserable.”  

---  

Raskolnikov enters, breaking the tension.  
Raskolnikov: “He has just been to see me.”  
Luzhin: “You seem to defend him suddenly.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Dounia expresses her discomfort with discussions about Mr. Svidrigaïlov, highlighting the negative impact he has on her.
